documents.document: C'mon Jock! Good luck in the @spfl #MascotRace at @HamiltonParkRC later today! If you win, there's you usual doggy biscuits and special doggy @VittoriaEd @LaFavorita_EDI @LaFavoritaEd pizza from your sponsors! 🐶 Go Jock go! ⚽️ https://t.co/4RpSsQcpP4
@Strutty74 @bighearts Yes! I want Jim White and Jo Wilson to announce it on Sky Sports with a yellow banner onscreen!😂😂😂
@MAB_Scotland @bighearts @ChrisStewartGrp @JamTarts @TurnhouseGolf 😂😂😂 Nothing like changing the whole team! 😂😂😂
@bighearts Yes please! I want a scarf above the head moment!😂😂😂
@JamboJapp @bighearts @TurnhouseGolf @jamb0skickback @MAB_Scotland @SFP_football @ElectrifyPR @YardDigital @LodgeHearts832 @ChrisStewartGrp @IainMerc Fun times!🏌️‍♂️

@paulkiddie @bighearts @TurnhouseGolf @IainMerc Well done on your runners up place Paul! Looking forward to seeing you at the St Johnstone game! Merce, how did you play? I saw some decent shots from your team!🏌️‍♂️
RT @paulkiddie: Well done @bighearts @TurnhouseGolf for a terrific golf day. Good course, good food, great cause! @immarkmartin @IainMerc

What a brilliant team effort at the @bighearts Golf Day. Lots of fun was had with awareness and money both raised. A really good Thursday out the office!👏🏌️‍♂️ https://t.co/gVpIogss6N https://t.co/g6NdZfcmdG

Live scenes at the @bighearts Golf Day today... 😂😂😂 Let’s raise loads for the great local work they do across all generations locally and have fun doing it! Mon’ the Big Hearts! #BHGolfday https://t.co/d3ZpsPPme3

Does anyone have any golf tips or hints? I’m signed up to the @bighearts Golf Day tomorrow and I haven’t played for a good six years! I might actually be the worst player in history.. ever!🙈🏌️‍♂️(I am looking forward to helping raise lots of money for local Big Hearts work!) https://t.co/6e7kXFSnyb

Quiet night watching #abouttime on @Film4 before tomorrow’s @JamTarts Family Fun Day at Tynecastle Park. Looking forward to seeing lots of people tomorrow for a good giggle. ⚽️😃
@BekkiHarley9513 @ScotRail This is like a daily occurrence now! I didn’t realise you were on the London Tube! 🙈

@gorgie18741 @JamTarts @bighearts @heartswomenfc @The_FOH @HeartsRant @talkHEARTS @jamb0skickback @JambosApp @ViewfromGorgie @HeartsOpinion @JayWithersmusic First team players will be down throughout the day mingling so that’ll be decent. There’s no plans to use the pitch this year as its bedding in. Lots going on, plenty to do, really hope to see you there. 👌

@gorgie18741 @JamTarts @bighearts @heartswomenfc @The_FOH @HeartsRant @talkHEARTS @jamb0skickback @JambosApp @ViewfromGorgie @HeartsOpinion @JayWithersmusic This all the same as previous years. There is tombola and stalls you can pay for but it is as has been! 😃

We’re all set for this Sunday’s @JamTarts Family Fun Day! You can pick up tickets here: https://t.co/KD2Fj2r4I9 , on the day at the Ticket Office or our cash turnstiles. There’s loads going on and we can’t wait to see you. Sunday 12-4pm at Tynecastle Park. https://t.co/N6AH6dlwaC

Next weekend I’ll be dusting down my headphones for a brief radio return. I’m looking forward to helping out @kingdomfm with a couple of cover shows. What buttons do I push again? What the heck am I going to talk about!? #radioreturn #guesswhosback #offthebench 📻🎤 https://t.co/5MikbfCLp0
Next... #EdFringe18 https://t.co/YarriUH1WF

I’ve just been to see @JessieRobinson with her musical impressions and absolutely loved it! You have to go and see her! Nicki Minaj’s song was worth the ticket money alone! So much fun in an hour! #EdFringe18 https://t.co/apocRVx659

Me @CraigGoodyear and Kenny have just walked the length of The Royal Mile and not one person offered us a flyer! I know we look like a rubbish manband but we’re not unfriendly!😂😂😂 #edfringe2018 https://t.co/iPlLF1RUFu

Heading out to the #edfringe2018 tomorrow night with a couple of mates. Any show recommendations around or after 9.30pm (when we reckon we’ll get up town👌) Any suggestions are most welcome! https://t.co/EYuRqTqa2F
@Col69er @WendyBald No spoilers! 🙈
@WendyBald Nothing to report here! It’s good though!x
Wow! #RiverCity is good tonight! It’s like Brookside from the 90’s, real drama! 👏
@srwallace1 @HeartsMcCrae Get ready for a rollercoaster play. Powerful, funny, sad and amazingly acted. An incredible show and well worthy of all the love and extended dates! ❤️
@cjsandison @jamb0skickback @HeartsMuseum @JamTarts Haaaaaa! That's also right up my street! #cheesytunes

Chuckle! 😂😂😂 https://t.co/E4InzE4yTu

Thanks to the guys in @HeartsMuseum who really looked after my Gran and Lilah on their first visit. If you’ve never been, pop in and see the history of @JamTarts and Edinburgh for yourself. It’s somewhere you could spend hours. Enter via Tynecastle Terrace ‘til 4pm and tomorrow. https://t.co/PPq4rKNpwW
